Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders.computeShader

Class ComputeShader

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.computeShader.ComputeShader
public class ComputeShader
extends java.lang.Object
Compute Shader class makes it possible to create ComputeShader objects. The Constructor takes a compute shader file and automatically loads everything necessary. To dispatch a Compute Shader with the given shader file, first load the necessary uniforms with the load* functions And then dispatch the shader with startShader(x,y,z) Code partly recycled from ShaderProgram Class.
Author:
Sven Kalle, SoSe2018
See Also:
ShaderProgram

      See Also:

    • bindTexture

      protected int bindTexture​(java.lang.String samplerName)
      Binds a sampler uniform to a texture unit. Gives textures with the same name the same location.
      Parameters:
      samplerName - Name of the sampler variable in the shader
      Returns:
      texture unit the sampler was bound to, starting at GL13.GL_TEXTURE0

    • getUniformLocation

      protected int getUniformLocation​(java.lang.String uniformName)
      Returns the location of a given uniform
      Parameters:
      uniformName - identifier of the uniform in the Shader
      Returns:
      location of this uniform
